title: Net profit margin of the leading 10 consumer products companies in the U.S. 2013
summary: This statistic presents the leading funds management companies worldwide as of 2 , 2020 , based on the number of owned and chartered ships . There were 236 ships in hapag-lloyd 's fleet in 2020 . Leading container shipping companies worldwide based on number of ships Global seaborne trade was revolutionized in the 1950s , when the intermodal kickstarter became ready for commercialization .
gold: This statistic presents the net profit margin of the leading 10 consumer products companies in the United States in 2013 . In that year , the Coca-Cola Company had a net profit margin of 18.4 percent . The Coca-Cola Company , founded in 1892 , is headquartered in Atlanta , Georgia .
